content:
Both my car and I can't wait to take you
to explore other worlds, discover strange things,
and oh, meet new <color=#8AAB4B>Neighbors</color>! Let's bring them back to play!
info: 准备外出-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Hey, I can finally take you on adventures!
If you want to explore more unknown Astralinks, that's no problem,
This will be my main job from now on.
info: 准备外出-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Oh right, Mobai said we should be more serious...
info: 准备外出-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
I'm Esassani, Safety Coordinator of the Windchaser Guild!
Today marks the successful completion of our initial safety patrol of the settlement's Astralink. Everything went smoothly~!
info: 准备外出-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Oh... but Mobai mentioned earlier that
the Astralink stations haven't been built yet, so it's not recommended to
use the <color=#8AAB4B>Lumia Bottle</color> to take you to unknown places.
info: 准备外出-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
If I don't make it back, "I'm terribly sorry about that~"
Something feels off here...{短暂停}With MY driving skills?!
As if I wouldn't make it back!
